name: Peanut Satay Noodles
instructions: Half way through, add edamame to the pot
When spaghetti is cooked, reserve 1/2 cup pasta water then drain the noodles and edamame and return them to the pot, without heat
While water comes to a boil, mince the ginger
Make Satay: whisk together peanut butter, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, chili garlic sauce, ginger, reserved pasta water in a bowl until smooth
Cook meatless farm patties in oil, while cooking break up the patties into bite size pieces until slightly crispy, 5-6 minutes
Add peppers to the meat and cook until peppers are tender-crisp, 2-3 minutes
Add satay sauce to meat and bring to simmer
Once simmering, add noodles and edamame
Season with salt and pepper, toss to coat
To serve, sprinkle cilantro, peanuts, chili peppers over noodles
